color.div:
Corpse-Weepers are large birds that live in the ruthless
2nd Layer of the Abyss. They are usually found in the near vicinity of their
nests. They live with their chicks, which they feed until they can fly on their own.
:hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Behaviour Details: Corpse-Weepers are carnivorous and are notorious for their sound mimicing capabilities to lure prey near. Despite this they are very affectionate creatures, with them being tamable if raised by people from the time they are chicks. :hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Item Drops: If one slays a Corpse-Weeper, be sure to collect its various parts. Their
feathers and
eyes can be used in certain recipies, or sold to vendors in Orths for a very high price. Their
meat reeks but tastes really good when cooked. :hypers:
